results.content: This course doesn't have enterprise e-commerce project and microservices and networking application, not all e-commerce module, not django pro advaned. Backend development process, how to test website.

response.content:
Hey Kamal,

This is just a beginner guide to introduce core concept of Django like MVC, databases, templating engine, permissions, Django admin etc. We cover atleast 5 different big projects that will have every small to big features of real world website. Moreover, we will come with new course to cover all the concepts that you have specified. I will let you know about the course as soon as it is published. Thank you so much
